official_title: Joint resolution authorizing and requesting the President to issue a proclamation designating the period from October 9, 1977, through October 15, 1977, as "National School Bus Safety Week."

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate October 9, 1977, through October 15, 1977, as "National School Bus Safety Week."

titles.title: Joint resolution authorizing and requesting the President to issue a proclamation designating the period from October 9, 1977, through October 15, 1977, as "National School Bus Safety Week."
